title: Transformative Instructional Design Process for Nursing Science Philosophy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Philosophy-based research capacity enhancement program for practicing nurses, conducted in hybrid (online/offline) environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain four or more philosophical paradigms in nursing science research.
Learners can systematically document their philosophy of nursing science.
Learners can deliver academic presentations reflecting a nursing scientist identity.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
